title: Saturated vs. Unsaturated Fats
description: Learn Saturated vs. Unsaturated Fats in one minute.

hook.text: Butter is solid at room temperature. Olive oil is liquid. The difference is one chemical bond.

punchline.text: One bond decides if a fat is solid, liquid, or dangerous.

quiz.question: Why are unsaturated fats liquid at room temperature?
options: Double bonds create kinks preventing tight packing
